entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
